title: New-ish player looking for people to play with
body:
Looking for some people to play some normals to learn and have fun with. 
I main top, but happy to play any role other than ADC. 

See you on the rift! :) 

IGN = MedievalWraith

replies.body:
yes plz im new to and need a buddy
{{summoner:31}}
yes plz i need a buddy
